card.name: Airatano
card.text: Unique. Court member of Ardor. He does not need to tap to play Dark-forges, Forged Below, or Reforging; only one of these cards can be on him at any given time. tap make any non-unique ore playable at his current under-deeps site. You may play Delver's Harvest or Earth-eater (as if it was a normal resource) on his company at any under-deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] site.

attr.value: Men — 5 strikes with 9 prowess (can only be cancelled by a magic, skill, or spell card)
If opponent has a faction in play at this site, this site contains a hoard, and the first item played here does not tap the site.
w w j j j s

Only characters with a home site in the Sunlands or the Uttersouth may brought into play at this site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.
Creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

card.name: Ardan Card Deck
card.text: Court Member of Ardor only. Any bearer of an Ardan Card Deck can support another bearer on an Ardan Card Deck as if they where in same company. A support to a CC is modified by supporting characters mind and subtracting the regions between both characters (to a maximum of 3 and a minimum of 1). Any bearer’s company may use any other’s bearers Lost or Stolen Knowledges as if it were present in his company.

card.name: Ardana
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use spirit-magic. +2 EI against elves. When Ardana is at Citadel of Ardor you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. If bearing an Ardan Card Deck, she can tap to modify any CC by another bearer of an Ardan Card Deck by +2.

card.name: Ardaron
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Can use spirit-magic. Any Calm-song or Poison of his Voice he uses is shuffled back into the deck instead of discarded.

card.name: Arduin
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Can use spirit-magic. +1 to his CC when caused by a spirit-magic card. Any Spying out the Land he uses is shuffled back into the deck instead of discarded.

card.name: Ardûval
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against Elves. Assignment Forsaken may be played on him as if he were a Fallen-wizard; tap shuffle one Assignment Forsaken from your sideboard into your deck. While Star of High Hope, Stars or TheEvenstar is in play he can use spirit-magic; his CC caused by spirit-magic cards receive +2. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Arrokko
card.text: Horse. Playable at any Hidden Site in Ardor. tap modify a CC forced by a hazard on an elf in the company by +2.tap cancel an animal (without an asterix *) or a demon attack keyed to any region in Ardor against its company. A player can only have 1 copy of Arrokko in play for each XXX in play.

attr.value: (1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against hero; canceled against Court of Ardor companies); (2nd) Elf — 1 strike with 14 prowess (only against overt or an avatar's company)

card.name: Book of Andraax
card.text: Unique. Stolen Knowledge. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. tap at any Hold of the Court of Ardor to make Guild of Element items playable at the site till the end of the turn. If at such a site bearer makes a CP modified by -2 to take either Hiding or Refuge from your play deck to your hand. This item is worth it mp if it is stored at hero Haven [H] in The Uttersouth

card.name: Bracers of Mira
card.text: Unique. Shield. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. If bearer carries not other items (except a staff) he receives +1 to prowess and body to a maximum. of 10. tap shuffle a spirit-magic or spell card just used by the bearer to the play deck instead of discarding it. Bracers of Mira is worth 3 mp if born by a character in the Uttersouth (or its adjacent regions) if and member of the Court of Ardor is in play by your opponent.

card.name: Cambragol
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. May always be assigned 2 strikes of any attack, regardless of the his status. May use up to 2 warrior skill cards against the same strike. May take trophies as if an overt character.

card.name: Camring
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 prowess against Undead and Magic-users. May take Undead creatures as hero trophies.

card.name: Court of Ardor
card.text: Unique. Playable if you control more Court Members of Ardor than all opponents in total. This card may also included with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. For each Elf faction you control in Ardor or its adjacent regions your GI is increased by +2. You receive 1 mp (to a maximum of 5) for: each Jewel of Unlight you have in play or stored; if you control or have taken prisoner Moran or Morelen.

card.name: Curubor
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Court Member of Ardor. Ardor Agent. In a one character company during CvCC you may discard either Burglary or An Article Missing from your hand to steal a non-ring item from opponent’s company.

attr.value: Men -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Earrings of Lyerin
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. Cannot be used if bearer also uses a helmet. (If bearer carries ) tap shuffle a spirit-magic or spell card just used by the bearer to the playdeck instead of discarding it. more

card.name: Elendor
card.text: Unique. Tatya. May use any 2 one-handed weapons at the same time. Must always be assigned the first strike of any attack regardless of her status.

card.name: Elven Fortress
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company using region cards with the last one being a Jungle [j]. This card is used as a site card, Border-hold[B] (automatic-attack: Elves — 3 strikes at 8 prowess (detainment against hero and Court of Ardor companies, items: (minor*), *only items battle-gear items or items which have Elf or elven in the card title; cards opponent draws: 2, you draw 1). Alternatively playable on an Elf-hold in a Jungle [j]; tap a scout and a ranger an the site to turn the site into a Hidden Site; all companies must tap an avatar, or a scout or a ranger when target site is revealed as a new site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Elves of Tâliran
card.text: Unique. Playable at Taurondë if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: Noldo (+2), Sinda (+2), Khelno (-3), Dunedain (+1), Hathorians (+2), any Elf faction in play by The Court of Ardor (-2)Elves of Tâliran is worth 1 additional mp for each hidden Jewel of Unlight you have in play.

attr.value: (1st) Traps — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess (using either his body or mind value against it); (2nd) Dwarves — 4 strikes with 10 prowess (canceled if the company contains only Dwarves)
Durang and Vein of Arda is playable at this site. *Non-unique hoard items are playable here; the first (Guild of Elements) item played here does not tap the site.

card.name: Falcon's Crest
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at any Court of Ardor hold. +1 body to a maximum of 9. If bearer also controls an ally with flying he receives +2 prowess. All rolls to keep control of this ally are modified by +3. Your receive this card’s mp when you control an ally with flying outsite a Court of Ardor hold.

card.name: Falcon of Ardor
card.text: Animal. Winged. Playable at Tirgoroth by a warrior, scout or ranger. When this ally enters play shuffle one Spying out the Land from your discard pile or sideboard to your deck. Controlling character can use it as if a skill card (no CP required). tap cancel an attack against itself and its controling character if in a one character company.

card.name: Fëatur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Can use spirit-magic. Member of the Guild of Elements. + 2 EI against Elves and Dúnedain. A White player player may use Fëatur as a grey agent, for which his home site becomes Laurrë's Manor. He is considered a Court Member of Ardor, if the female Fëatur is not in play. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

attr.value: Member of the Guild of Elements

card.name: Fëatur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use spirit-magic and shadow-magic. +2 EI against non-Noldo, non-Sinda elves.

card.name: Forgotten South of the World
card.text: Spider creatures can be keyed to Jungle [j] and Shadow-land [s] regions in The Uttersouth. Additionally if Court of Ardor is not in play, creatures keyable to Shadow-land [s] may be played keyed to any region in Ardor; creatures keyable to Dark-domain [d] may be played keyed to MÃ»makan, Sakal an-KhÃ¢r and ZurghÃ´r. Discard this card when a creature keyed to one of these regions (not to a region symbol) is defeated.

attr.value: Men -- 3 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Ganim
card.text: Unique. Playable at a non-haven site in Gan, if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Mûmkani (-2), Hathorians (+2), Khelnôr (-2), Kirani (+2) tap to bring one Oliphaunt from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: (1st) Animals — 3 strikes with 6 prowess; (2nd) Traps — 1 strike with 10 prowess
Swamp. *Contains a hoard if opponent discards a lost knowledge it controls; 2nd automatic-attack must be faced after the play of a major item at the site.
(1st) Animals — 3 strikes with 6 prowess; (2nd) Traps — 1 strike with 10 prowess
Swamp. *Contains a hoard if opponent discards a lost knowledge it controls; 2nd automatic-attack must be faced after the play of a major item at the site.

card.name: Gesathago
card.text: Unique. Dragon. Sea Serpent. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. +2 prowess if Storms of Ossë or Noose of the Sea are in play. As a creature may be played at Gesathago's Lair. If Doors of Night is in play may also be played in Koros Bay, Mûmakan Coast, Shores of Maquatostoth, Straight of Tumag, Ûsakan Bay, or keyed to non-Free-hold, non-Haven sites in these regions. As a long-event any company moving in one of the above regions faces an attack by Gesathago for which the attack receives -2 prowess, -1 body, but an additional strike.

attr.value: Dragon - 2 strikes with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)
Hidden Site. A character with a Port as his home site must tap when this site is revealed. Treasure items played at this site may be come from your hand or discard pile.
Dragon - 2 strikes with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)
Hidden Site. A character with a Port as his home site must tap when this site is revealed. Treasure items played at this site may be come from your hand or discard pile.

card.name: Gorthaur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use sorcery. Assignment Forsaken may be played on him as if he were a Court of Ardor; tap shuffle one Assignment Forsaken from your sideboard into your deck.

card.name: Guild of Elements
card.text: Unique. Each Member of the Guild of Elements increases its controlling player's GI by +2. tap place one Lore of Ages on a Member of the Guild of Elements character in any of your companies; Lore of Ages gives zero corruption points on such a character. If such a character is eliminated you may play Mighty Was the Fallen from your sideboard as if in hand. Members of the Guild of Elements may tap as if an avatar to access the sideboard; if 2 of such characters tap you may target hazards instead. If 4 of such characters tap you may return a site card from your discard pile to your location deck. This card is worth 1 mp per each `hidden´ Jewel of Unlight you have in play.

card.name: Hated Elves
card.text: Dúnedain and men with a home site in the Uttersouth and elves are effected by Unhappy Blows as if they were dwarves and elves.If any one player has a Dúnedain, an Elf, and a Man faction in play remove this card from the game; it cannot be discarded by any other resource short-event.

card.name: Hathorians
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tanith if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Kirani (+2), Sinda Elves (+2), Elves of Tâliran (+3), overt or Ringwraith character (-4)Special: This faction is worth 5 mp to a non- White player.

card.name: Headband of Elerior
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. Bearer cannot be targeted by opponent's spells or magic cards. Bearer can use spirit-magic. If bearer if a Wizard or Elf-lord, or could already use spirit-magic, he can opt to effect any company within his current region (or adjacent regions) with any 1 spirit-magic card per turn.

card.name: Infested Jungles
card.text: Non-unique Awakened Plant creatures may be played keyed to Jungle [j] regions (by type or name); and also to Ruins & Lairs [R] sites in these regions. Additionally, Darkness under Tree and Waiting Shadow may be played on characters moving with a Jungle [j] in their site path even if Doors of Night is not in play. You may tap a faction you have in play at a site in a Jungle region to cancel one of this card's effects for one of your companies. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: (1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (canceled against Court of Ardor companies); (2nd) Demon — 1 strike with 14 prowess (only against overt or an avatar's company)

Byrillium-lode, Gems of Arda or Ithildin are playable at this site without further requirements; if any of these cards is played here, this site cannot be untapped or discarded and does never return to the location deck.

card.name: Jewel of Unlight
card.text: Jewel. Playable at any Hidden Site in Ardor (or maybe whole Uttersouth) and its adjacent regions. A Court of Ardor player must play them at any Free-hold [F] instead. tap cancel an environment played during bearer’s movement/hazard phase before it resolves. tap reveal to yourself any number of cards from the top of your deck, bearer makes a CC modified by on the number of cards revealed. Place a token on this card each time you reveal more than 5 cards from the top of your deck. Jewel of Unlight is worth 1 mp (to a maximum of 3) for each token placed on it.

card.name: Jungle Demon
card.text: Demon. 1 strike

card.name: Khelekar
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use sorcery. Any Bitter-cold he uses is shuffled back into your deck instead of discarded. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Khelnôr
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Elf-hold in Ardor where no other Elf faction is in play if the influence check is greater than 10.

card.name: Kirani
card.text: Unique. Playable at Korlan if the influence check is greater than 9. Standort Modifications: Elves (+2), any manifestation of Indûr Dawndeath in play (-4), Elves of Tâliran (+3), Khelnôr (-2)If placed under Profitable Trade this faction is worth 1 additional mp (to a maximum of 3) for each resource permanent-event played on Kirani or Korlan

card.name: Kirlhach
card.text: Unique. Weapon. +2 prowess (+3 and -1 to strike’s body against Demons and Members of the Court of Ardor). tap during CvCC to untap bearer. Bearer makes a CC when Kirlhach becomes tapped.

attr.value: Major items are only playable if the automatic-attack has been defeated.
Major items are only playable if the automatic-attack has been defeated.

card.name: Klaen
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +2 prowess against magic users. +2 EI against Elves and Men with home sites in The Uttersouth. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Laurelindorenan
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at any Hidden Site in the Uttersouth. If bearer is moving through a Jungle [j] region, he may use Herblore as if Radagast (and treating the Jungle [j] as the required Wilderness [w] region). During his end-of-turn phase bearer may tap to place Herblore from his hand with this item, Herblore stays with the item and is considered to be in your hand until used.

card.name: Laurrë Menelrana
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Member of the Guild of Elements. +2 prowess against magic users and Court Members of Ardor. May use any weapon with Elven Blade on it, as if a warrior. +3 EI against elves and elf factions playable in the Uttersouth or its adjacent regions. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

attr.value: Elven Wards — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess, using either body or mind value; which ever is lower (detainment)

card.name: Lianis
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Pallando.

card.name: Linsûl
card.text: Unique. Nelya. Court Member of Ardor. Linsûl can play Calm-song as if a skill card (no CP required). Elf-song affects her company as if her company were at a hero Haven [H]. tap to take Healing Song from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Lyerin
card.text: Unique. Elf. Tatya. Undead. Playable at any site in Ardor by an Elf using Here, There or Yonder. tap cancel Call of the Sea played on any Elf in his company till end of the turn.tap at a Guild of Element site to taken one item only playable at such a site from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Mistress of the Court of Ardor
card.graphics: Mistress of the Court of Ardor.jpg
card.text: Unique. Manifesation of Ardana. Elf. 1 strike. As a permanent-event any Elf creature keyable to Wilderness [w ] may also be keyed to any j region in The Uttersouth and attack as detainment against Court of Ardor player's companies. As a creature may be played keyed to any hold of the Court of Ardor (canceled against the Court of Ardor companies).

card.name: Moran
card.text: Unique. Noldo./Tatya. +2 to his CC while any Court Member of Ardor is in play by an opponent. +1 to all body check against manifestations of a Court Member of Ardor. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth. You may play Moran from your sideboard if discard a Guinarnen from your hand at any of the sites where Guinarnen could normally be played.

card.name: Morelen
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Tatya. She may not be one of the starting characters. She may only be brought into play at her home site, regardless of all other card's abilities. All Court Members of Ardor receive +1 prowess and +1 to their CP if Morelen is in their company.

card.name: Morfuin
card.text: Unique. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against warrior characters. Morfuin may use Scourge of Fire as if he were a Balrog in Flame of Ûdun mode. tap shuffle one Scourge of Fire from your sideboard into your deck.

card.name: Mornaur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. tap receive sorcery skill till the end of the turn. If using Some Secret Art of Flame, he receives an additional +2 prowess.

card.name: Morthaur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against Noldo and Tatya elves. Assignment Forsaken may be played on him as if he were a Court of Ardor. tap shuffle one Assignment Forsaken from your sideboard into your deck.

card.name: Mûmak-helmet
card.text: Unique. Playable on Indûr the Ringwraith at any non-Free-hold site in The Sunlands or The Uttersouth (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Indûr; he gains the ranger skill and is not taken back to hand on a body check result of 7 or 8. Any Oliphaunt in his company is not discarded when using starter movement and moving more than 3 regions. Opponent must reveal 1 hazard from his hand per Wilderness [w] or Jungle [j] region in Indûr site path. When Indûr controls an Oliphaunt, the company is in Fell Rider mode: any character controlling a horse ally or Oliphaunt may be in his company (and no other characters or allies). Indûr's prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike.

card.name: Mûmakil Traders
card.text: Playable at any non-haven site in Mûmakan or its adjacent regions if the influence check is greater than 8. tap to bring one Oliphaunt from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Power of the Court Set Forth
card.graphics: Power of the Court Set Forth.jpg
card.text: Playable if you have at least 3 Court Members of Ardor at a Court-hold. Discard a magic card from your hand to place either Drowining Seas with a Port or a site in Coastal Seas [c], or Nature’s Revenge with a site in a Jungle [Jj] or Devastation on a Border-hold [B] or Shadow-hold [S] (not a Court-hold) in the Uttersouth; these cards cannot be discarded while this card is in play and affect every company moving to these sites. These sites may be as many regions away from the Court-hold as you tap Court Members of Ardor at the site. Discard this card if you cannot tap a Court Member of Ardor at the Court-hold during end-of-turn-phase. You receives 1 mp to a maximum of 3 for each site your affect with any of the named cards above Cannot be dupliaced on a given Court-hold.

card.name: Rilia
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court member of Ardor. Can use spirit-magic. +2 EI against Kelno Elves. Ancient Skill and Wisdom may be played on her, regardless of the mind restriction or her site.

card.name: Ringlin's Axe
card.text: Unique. Axe. Weapon. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. +2 prowess to a maximum of 9 (+4 to a maximum of 10 against Demons). Elven Blade may be played on Ringlin’s Axe, which then also works against Demon attacks. Ringlin's Axe is worth 3 mp if born by a character in the Utter-south (or its adjacent regions) if Court of Ardor is in play by your opponent.

card.name: Sorcerer-king of Mûmakan

card.text: Unique. Sinda. Court Member of Ardor. +4 EI against the Winds of Taurang faction.tap heal an animal ally in his company. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Taurion
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Can use shadow-magic.

attr.value: Non-Elf, non-Wizard characters may only be brought into play at this site, if one of their home sites is within The Uttersouth territory. When a non-unique elf enters play at Taurondë you may place a tokens on him to change his descent (blue - Tatya, green - Nelya, black - Kelno).

(1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess; (2nd) Traps - Elven Wards - 3 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (3rd) Elves — 4 strikes with 11 prowess (only against overt companies)

Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site (unless your Ringwraith has a home site in the Uttersouth).

card.name: The Destruction of Anar and Ithil
card.graphics: The Destruction of Anar and Ithil.jpg
card.text: Unique. Ritual. Playable at the Citadel of Ardor if you have a stored ore and technology item at the site. Add a token to this card during the site phase. During you end-of-turn phase make a roll adding 1 for each Member of the Court of Ardor, +4 for each Jewel of Unlight, +2 for each magic card you discard from your hand or the company; add +1 for the first token, +2 for the second (etc). If the result is more than 25, you receives this card’s mp. Folling cards cannot be played: Dawn Comes Early, Dawn Take You All, Moon, New Moon, Sun, and The Sun Shone Fiercely. Additionally these cards are never discarded: Mordó, Morgoth’s Ring. and Night. If you receives this card’s mp, all Members of the Court of Ardor requires 2 less mind to control and receive +2 to all CC.

card.name: The Order of Horus
card.text: Unique. Playable at Vog Mur if the influence check is greater than 11. Standort Modifications: For any treasure item the company discards (+2), Dunedain(+1)Special. This faction if worth 3 mp if campaigning; +1 if at Battle-ground site; +1 if under the control of Valkrist.

card.name: The Servants of the Real Fire
card.graphics: The Servants of the Real Fire.jpg

card.name: The Weavetress
card.text: Court of Ardor or Elf-lord only. Your female characters at an Elf-hold may tap to place an Elven Cloak or Shadow Cloak from your sideboard or discard pile with a character at in their company. If each character in the company bears a cloak (even Cloak of Many Colours), you may play Cloaked by Darkness on it (as if your were a Balrog player). tap: bring one Cloaked by Darkness from your sideboard to your play deck (reshuffle).

attr.value: Battleground. Port. * Information is only playable by a company moving to this site from a site where an opponent's company was present.
Items (minor, major, greater*) *non-unique battle-gear item only
Men -- each character faces 1 strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Dúnedain -- 3 strikes with 10 prowess (against overt companies only)**
Battleground. Port. **The 2nd automatic-attack must also be faced by every company containing Ûsakani characters.

card.name: Tiara of Lysa
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at any Guild of Elements site.

attr.value: (1st) Animals — 3 strikes with 10 prowess (an ally with flying may tap to cancel this attack); (2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 3 prowess (attacker chooses); both are canceled against companies containing only dunadan andelves.
Only a flying company can enter this site.

card.name: Tirial
card.text: Unique. Tatya. May be assigned as many strikes from an attack as her base prowess fits into the attacks prowess.

attr.value: The first jewel item played here does not tap the site.
The first jewel item played here does not tap the site.

card.name: Tûranar
card.text: Unique. Tatya. +1 EI against Tatya Elves. +2 EI against Elves of Tâliran.+2 prowess to all attacks keyed to a Jungle [j] region by type or name. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

attr.value: Hidden Site. Contains a hoard. Any Elf creature may be played keyed to the site against an overt company.

card.name: Valandor
card.text: Unique. Tatya. +1 prowess against attacks keyed to a Jungle [j} region or to sites in such a region.

card.name: Valglin
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Court Member of Ardor. Ardor Agent. Can use Counterfeit as a skill card, to turn into a Dunadan or Man (place a token to mark you choice). Valglin is only considered as such for company composition only.

card.name: Valkrist
card.text: Unique. Half-elf. Leader. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against The Order of Horus faction.

card.name: Vallin
card.text: Unique. Sinda. +2 EI against animal factions. Vallin is considered a ranger while moving with only Jungle [j] regions in his site path. All animal/horse allies under his control receive +1 prowess and body; if such an ally is eliminated wound Vallin (no body check is required).

card.name: Valmorgûl
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against Khelnô elves. Can use shadow-magic and sorcery.

card.name: Valnaur
card.text: Unique. Tatya. tap to receive sorcery skill till the end of turn.

card.name: Valsûl
card.text: Unique. Tatya. +1 body if carrying a blade weapon.

card.name: Vilwarokko
card.text: Horse. Winged. Playable at any Hidden Site in Ardor if you discard a Lost Knowledge. tap modify a CC forced by a resource on an elf in the company by +2. tap cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against its bearer or itself. The hazard limit against this company is increased by +1 if opponent is a minion player. A player can only have 1 copy of Vilwarokko in play for each XXX in play.

card.name: Winds of Taurang
card.text: Unique. Playable at Taurang if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Magic-user (+2), +4 if a prisoner card/ character is eliminated from the company.Special: tap: attack any one character during your turn at any non-Haven site within the Ardor territory; the character faces a Demon/Slayer attack 1 strike with 12 prowess; resulting body checks are modified by +1. If this attack is defeaded invert this faction (and wound the character who influenced it), it cannot be reinverted, until another influence check against it is succesfully made.

card.name: Yavëkamba
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Healing cards Yavëkamba uses affect all characters in his company.
